It's definitely as good as they say it is. One thing to note is the game wasn't exactly made for modern hardware so with high frame rates the physics on moving boxes is super fast and can launch you. Pretty fun, but if it bothers you, I recommend googling the Xash3D engine. Fixes a few engine bugs like that

Even 20 years later, it's still a incredible game that must be played. Sure the graphics might be old now but the non-stopping action and the story are wonderful and since it is considered old it is cheap so there is no reason to not buy the game. Again worth checking out. As for the extensions of the game, opposing force is in my oppinion just as good but blue shift is a little short and not as energetic. So yeah go for it !

I was really hesitant about purchasing this game do to the graphics throwback and dialogue that  will make you cringe. But when I finally did purchase and play it I wished I had started sooner. This game just doesn't feel like a late 90s game, but more like a late 2000s game It really feels like the game is at least 10 years newer, which in my opinion is very rare to see in the gaming industry. I see now how half-life completely changed peoples idea of gaming. That's without it's slow but amazing story.
excelente modo historia. mejor juego de todos los tiempos

The more I play this game, the more I feel like only its graphics aged. The amount of small details it has for a soon-to-be 21 years old game is simply incredible. The gameplay is very intuitive, surprisingly excellent for a game coming from an era where it was hard to find a good one.
I bought this game to experience something I have never played entirely before, and to ready myself for the remake of that game: 'Black Mesa'. I ended up playing a game I now prefer to its sequel(s).
A classic with amazing story line, it's where it all began so everyone should appreciate this game.

A legendary game which established the Half-Life franchise for its great gameplay, gripping story and unforgettable characters. This game and its mechanics are the hallmark of the best FPS experience in the industry, which lead to the creation of Counter-Strike. Highly recommended.
